title: Solutions+ Signs MoU as Elite Partner for AI Everything Abu Dhabi 2026
summary: At GITEX GLOBAL — the world's largest tech and startup show — Solutions+ secured a landmark partnership for AI Everything Abu Dhabi 2026, setting a new standard for national AI innovation.
content:
Following the MoU signed between Managing Director Nasir Al Nabhani and Trixie LohMirmand of KAOUN International, Solutions+ becomes an Elite Featured Partner at AI Everything Abu Dhabi.

This collaboration positions Solutions+ at the forefront of the UAE's AI transformation — reinforcing its commitment to on-prem AI solutions that empower governments and enterprises alike.

Together, we're shaping the future of AI and smart technologies in the UAE and beyond. The partnership will enable Solutions+ to showcase its cutting-edge AI infrastructure solutions to a global audience of innovators, investors, and industry leaders.

AI Everything Abu Dhabi 2026 is expected to attract over 30,000 attendees from 150+ countries, making it the premier platform for AI innovation in the Middle East.
